name: polymer-feedback-form
description: Simple polymer feedback form test application

scripts.postbuild: npm run build:minify:js && npm run build:minify:html
scripts.build: vulcanize src/feedback-element.html -o build/elements.vulcanized.html --inline-scripts --inline-css --strip-comments | crisper --source build/elements.vulcanized.html --html build/elements.vulcanized.html --js build/elements.crisper.js

author: Bruce17 <Bruce17@users.noreply.github.com>
